item.description:
Welcome to our own Sano Café! Our commitment to providing our community and customers with the highest quality and freshest natural and organic products available is fully evident the moment you are seated in our cozy dining nook. We take great pride in the creativity and 30+ year's experience of our kitchen, deli and bakery team. They have developed innovative recipes that are nutritionally balanced as well as downright delicious! We use only the finest natural and organic meats, additive-free chicken, fresh seafood, organic produce, herbs, grains, seasonings and expeller-pressed oils in our kitchen's creations. In addition, multi-pure filtered water is used during all food preparation stages, including rinsing.

We welcome your special dietary requests and will be happy to accommodate them. We encourage you to share your appetite with us and are confident you will enjoy your wholesome dining experience as much as we enjoy creating it for you. The Sano Café was voted best vegetarian restaurant in Worcester!
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp May Meetup
